license.name: Grupa Allegro Sp. z o. o.

put.summary: Modify the Buy Now price in an offer
put.description: Use this resource to change the Buy Now price in a single offer. More information about this resource you can find here.

parameters.name: commandId
parameters.description: Universally Unique  Identifier (UUID) you generate to enforce idempotency. UUID specification: http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4122.txt

200.description: The command was created and queued for processing

default.description: An immediate error response is returned in the case it failed to validate the command input data or there is an internal problem with our systems

requestBody.description: Command input data. Note that the amount field must be transferred as a string to avoid rounding errors. A currency must be provided as a 3-letter code as defined in ISO 4217. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes)

post.description: [BETA] Use this resource to create a draft offer draft. More information about this resource you can find here.

put.summary: [BETA] Complete a draft offer draft or edit ongoing offers
put.description: [BETA] Use this resource to complete a draft offer draft or edit ongoing offers. More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: [BETA] Get all fields of the particular offer
get.description: [BETA] Use this resource to retrieve all fields of the particular offer. More information about this resource you can find here.

put.summary: [BETA] Modify multiple offers publication at once.
put.description: [BETA] Use this resource to modify multiple offers publication at once. More information about this resource you can find here.

400.description: Semantically incorrect request or provided conditions not correct

get.summary: [BETA] Get a report summary for a particular commandId
get.description: [BETA] Use this resource to retrieve information about the offer listing statuses. You will receive a summary with a number of correctly listed offers and errors. More information about this resource you can find here.

200.description: report was generated and successfully returned

get.summary: [BETA] Get a detailed report single command task
get.description: [BETA] Use this resource to retrieve information about the offer statuses on the site (Defaults: limit = 100, offset = 0). More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: Get user ratings-summary
get.description: Use this resource to receive feedback statistics. More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: Get user-ratings
get.description: Use this resource to receive your sales score. More information about this resource you can find here.

parameters.name: user.id
parameters.description: Filter by user id, you are allowed to get your ratings only

post.description: Use this resource to creates a group of addtional services. More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: Get additional service groups by user ID
get.description: Use this resource to retrieve a list of groups with additional services available to a given user which you may assign to offers. More information about this resource you can find here.

422.description: Validation failed - your request was correct, but the promotion could not be created.

get.summary: Get a list of promotions by user id
get.description: Get a list of promotions defined by the specified user. You can list only your own promotions. More information about this resource you can find here (Bundles) and here (Multipack).

200.description: Successfully returned the requested list of promotions

post.description: This endpoint calculates fees for a provided offer conditions. The quotation is estimated and based on the current configuration of the Allegro price list and the data entered in this API. The stated price does not include package discounts. The rules of charging and amount of charges are described in the Allegro regulations in Appendix 4. The final amount of the fee for the offer will be available after approval under the tab: My Account> Accounts> History. More information about this resource you can find here.

422.description: Server understands the content but can not process the requested data (example not existing categoryId)

put.description: Use this resource to modify multiple offers at once. More information about this resource you can find here.

400.description: Semantically incorrect request or provided conditions not correct

get.summary: Get a report summary for a particular commandId
get.description: Use this resource to find out how many offers were edited within one {commandId}. You will receive a summary with a number of successfully edited offers. More information about this resource you can find here.

200.description: report was generated and successfully returned

get.summary: Get a detailed report for a single command task
get.description: Use this resource to retrieve a detailed summary of changes introduced within one {commandId} (defaults: limit = 100, offset = 0). More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: [BETA] Get IDs of main Allegro categories

get.summary: [BETA] Get category by ID
get.description: [BETA] Use this resoirce to get the lowest tier category (remember – an offer can be listed in the lowest tier category if the category is marked “leaf”: true). More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: [BETA] Get parameters by category ID
get.description: [BETA] Use this resoyrce to get the lists of parameters that are supported by the category you indicated. Every time a list of parameters supported by the input category is returned. More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: Get additional services definitions by user ID
get.description: Use this resource to get additional services definitions by user ID. More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: Get current offer quotes for authenticated user and list of offers.
get.description: This endpoint returns current offer quotes (listing and promo fees) cycles for authenticated user and list of offers. More information about this resource you can find here. 2018-07-18 - resource update here.

parameters.name: offer.id
parameters.description: List of offer ids, maximum 20 values

401.description: Full authentication is required to access this resource

503.description: Service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

get.summary: Get a promotion by its id
get.description: Use this resource to returns the requested promotion. You need to use its unique id. More information about this resource you can find here (Bundles) and here (Multipack).

delete.description: Use this resource to deactivate the requested promotion. You need to use its unique id. More information about this resource you can find here (Bundles) and here (Multipack).

get.summary: Get seller warranties listing
get.description: Use this resource to get seller warranties listing. More information about this resource you can find here.

put.description: Use this resource to create or update variant set. More information about this resource you can find here.

201.description: Variant set created or updated successfully

get.summary: Get variant set
get.description: Use this resource to get variant set by set id. More information about this resource you can find here.

delete.description: Use this resource to delete variant set by id. Offers included in variant set will not be stopped or modified by this operation. More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: Get created variant sets.
get.description: Use this resource to get created variant sets. The returned variant sets are ordered by name. More information about this resource you can find here.

parameters.name: user.id
parameters.description: Filter by user id, you are allowed to get your variant sets only.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of first returned variant set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of returned variant sets.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Filter variant sets by name or offer id.

get.summary: Get search results combined with navigable categories and filters.
get.description: Use this resource to get a list of offers according to provided parameters. At least one of: phrase, seller.id or category.id is required. Additional available parameters vary depending on category.id. The parameters are defined in the filters entity. More information about this resource you can find here.

parameters.name: seller.id
parameters.description: Identifier of the seller. May be provided more than once. Only items of provided sellers are returned.

parameters.name: searchMode
parameters.description: Search mode. Allowed values: *REGULAR* - searching for a phrase in the title of offers; *DESCRIPTIONS* - searching for a phrase in titles and offers descriptions; *CLOSED* -  searching for a phrase in titles of closed offers. Default *REGULAR*.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of first returned offer from all search results. Must be multiple of *limit*.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of offers in response (acceptable values: from 0 to 100, default is 60).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Search results sorting order. Allowed values (+ or no prefix means ascending order, - prefix means descending order): relevance, +price, -price, +withDeliveryPrice, -withDeliveryPrice, -popularity, +endTime, -startTime. The default sorting order is relevancy.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify parts that should be included in the output. Allowed values are names of top level entities and *all* as an alias to all entities. By default, all top level entities are included. Use "-" prefix to exclude entity. Example: *include=-all&include=filters&include=sort* - returns only filters and sort entities.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Defines behaviour of searching when no results with exact phrase match are found: *true* - related (not exact) results are returned; *false* - empty results are returned. The default is true.

400.description: Bad request. Check if all necessary parameters are provided.

404.description: Given category was not found. Check category.id parameter.

422.description: One of parameters have invalid value or given parameters combination is forbidden.

502.description: Error caused by upstream service failure.

get.summary: Get order events
get.description: Use this resource to returns events that allow you to monitor actions which clients perform, i.e. making a purchase, filling in the checkout form (FOD), finishing payment process, making a surcharge. More information about this resource you can find here.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: You can use the event ID to retrieve subsequent chunks of events

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Specify array of event types for filtering. Allowed values are:
  * `BOUGHT`: purchase without checkout form filled in
  * `FILLED_IN`: checkout form filled in but payment is not completed yet so data could still change
  * `READY_FOR_PROCESSING`: payment completed. Purchase is ready for processing.

get.summary: Get order event statistics
get.description: Use this resource to returns object that contains event id and occurrence date of the latest event. It gives you current starting point for reading events. More information about this resource you can find here.

get.summary: Get order list
get.description: Use this resource to get an order list. More information about this resource you can find here.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of first returned checkout-form from all search results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of checkout-forms in response (acceptable values: from 0 to 100, default is 100).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Specify status value that checkout-forms must have to be included in the output. Allowed values are:
  * `BOUGHT`: purchase without checkout form filled in
  * `FILLED_IN`: checkout form filled in but payment is not completed yet so data could still change
  * `READY_FOR_PROCESSING`: payment completed. Purchase is ready for processing.
  * `ALL`: return all checkout-forms

parameters.name: lineItems.boughtAt.lte
parameters.description: The upper bound of date time range from which checkout forms will be taken.

parameters.name: lineItems.boughtAt.gte
parameters.description: The lower bound of date time range from which checkout forms will be taken.

400.description: Bad Request - Returned when request parameters contains illegal values.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Returned when limit or offset value is outside an acceptable range

get.summary: Get order details
get.description: Use this resource to get an order details. More information about this resource you can find here.

createdAt.description: Answer creation datetime in ISO 8601 format

type.description: One of the type COUNTRY_SAME_QUANTITY or COUNTRY_DELIVERY_SAME_QUANTITY

deliveryCost.description: Average value of delivery cost rate

ChangePrice.description: The change price command with its input and output data

ChangePriceWithoutOutput.description: The change price command's input data

finishedAt.description: Date of completion of the modification. Format (ISO 8601) - yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

scheduledAt.description: Date of the modification schedule. Format (ISO 8601) - yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

CompatibilityList.description: List of items compatible with offer

invoice.description: Invoice type: VAT, VAT_MARGIN, WITHOUT_VAT, NO_INVOICE

createdAt.description: Creation date: Format (ISO 8601) - yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ. Cannot be modified

updatedAt.description: Last update date: Format (ISO 8601) - yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ. Cannot be modified

dayOfWeek.description: Days of the week: MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY, SATURDAY, SUNDAY. Date format ISO 8601

method.description: Available forms of payment: CASH - cash, CARD - card.

invoice.description: Invoice type, one of: VAT, VAT_MARGIN, WITHOUT_VAT, NO_INVOICE

id.description: UUID. When creating a point of service (Post) the field is ignored. It is required when updating (Put) a point of service.

type.description: Indicates point type. The only valid value so far is PICKUP_POINT.

openHours.description: Possible empty list of opening hours.

serviceTime.description: Delivery time / Time period for receipt. Date format ISO 8601 e.g. 'PT24H'

payments.description: An empty list of payment types is available.

confirmationType.description: Confirmation method: AWAIT_CONTACT - We will inform you about the time of receipt, CALL_US - Please make an appointment, CONTACT_NOT_REQUIRED - Contact is not required.

status.description: Point of service status: ACTIVE - active, TEMPORARILY_CLOSED - temporarily closed, CLOSED_DOWN - closed down, DELETED - deleted.

endingAt.description: Publication ending date: Format (ISO 8601) - yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ. Cannot be modified

startingAt.description: Publication starting date: Format (ISO 8601) - yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ. Cannot be modified

status.description: Publication status, one of: INACTIVE, ACTIVATING, ACTIVE, ENDED

possibleTo.description: Date until a removal request can be submitted in ISO 8601 format

request.description: Submitted removal request, null if removal was not requested

createdAt.description: Removal request creation datetime in ISO 8601 format

message.description: Message containing explanation for removing rating

format.description: Selling mode format, one of: BUY_NOW, AUCTION, ADVERTISEMENT

name.description: User defined name of the shipping rates set

maxQuantityPerPackage.description: Maximum quantity per package for the given delivery method. Minimum value is 1.

firstItemRate.description: Rate for the first item in the parcel for the given delivery method

nextItemRate.description: Rate for every other item, after the first, in the same parcel for the given delivery method

shippingTime.description: Custom shipping time for the given delivery method. If not set the default shipping time for the method is used.

from.description: ISO 8601 duration format, e.g. P3D for 3 days

to.description: ISO 8601 duration format, e.g. P3D for 3 days

lastModified.description: Date and time of the last modification of the set in UTC ISO 8601 format

unit.description: Stock unit, one of: UNIT, PAIR, SET

failed.description: Current number of failed offers updates

success.description: Current number of success offers updates

total.description: Total number of scheduled offers updates

UUID.description: Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) generated by you that can be used to enforce idempotency. UUID specification: http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4122.txt

answer.description: Seller's answer, if null seller did not publish answer

excludedFromAverageRates.description: If true this rating was not included in calculating average user rates

ratings.description: List of ratings that match requested filter. Empty when no rating matched.

notRecommended.description: Summary of data concerning users that not recommended the seller

recommended.description: Summary of data concerning users that recommended the seller

recommendedPercentage.description: Percentage of unique buyers recommending seller

condition.description: Offer condition, if is new, used or other.

quantity.description: Quantity of items to be sold. If set, minimum value 1

shop.description: Deprecated. Value 'true' sets the 'offer.type' field to 'shop', value 'false' to 'offer'. This field is ignored if 'offer.type' field is set.

soldQuantity.description: Quantity of sold items. Relates to commission success fee. If set, minimum value 1

type.description: Offer type. 'type' or 'shop' fields must be provided. Takes precedence over 'shop' field

scheduledFor.description: Date and time for scheduling ACTIVATE action, will be ignored for another actions

includeQuotingBundles.description: Include in calculation user's active bundles which allow to publish for free offer or use for free promotion options.

colorPattern.description: Label that allows to group variants via image. All variants having the same image should have identical identifier in this field.

count.description: Total number of variant sets matching the query.

images.description: Gallery of images. Only URL of original size image is provided. First image should be considered as a thumbnail on listing.

count.description: Results count in this category (available only for categories.subcategories array).

filters.description: Filters with counters available for given search, which can be used to refine search results.

OfferSellerContact.description: Optional contact details for items with advertisement selling format.

company.description: Indicates whether the seller is a company.

superSeller.description: Indicates whether the item has Super Seller option.

OfferSeller.description: Information about the seller of the item.

unit.description: Unit type of the item (UNIT, PAIR or SET).

available.description: Number of items available to buy.

emphasized.description: Indicates whether the item is promoted.

bold.description: Indicates whether the item has bold title option.

highlight.description: Indicates whether the item has highlight option.

OfferPromotion.description: Information about promotion options of the item.

OfferLowestPrice.description: Lowest shipping cost. Lack of this entity means that the item has no shipping options (ie. advertisement or an item with electronic delivery only).

OfferPrice.description: Price of the item. It is buy now price for *BUY_NOW* selling format or current auction price for *AUCTION* format.

OfferFixedPrice.description: Fixed (buy now) price of the item in case of *AUCTION* selling format with buy now option enabled.

availableForFree.description: Indicates whether the item has free shipping option.

OfferDelivery.description: Information about available shipping options for the item.

popularity.description: Popularity of item for *BUY_NOW* selling format.

bidCount.description: Number of bidders for *AUCTION* selling format.

OfferSellingMode.description: This section indicates selling format and prices.

id.description: Identifier of external service (OTOMOTO, OTODOM, CHARYTATYWNI_ALLEGRO).

url.description: URL to the web page of advertisement.

OfferVendor.description: This section is available only for advertisements, linking to external services.

OfferPublication.description: This section is available only for items with defined end of publication.

subcategories.description: Categories with counters, which can be used to refine search results.

path.description: Categories path to the current listing category (breadcrumbs).

name.description: Name of the option; for NUMERIC parameters - word indicating start or end of range (ie. *from*, *to*).

value.description: Filter value. Should be used as query parameter value in request. This can be: for MULTI and SINGLE parameters - value identifier (ie. KUJAWSKO_POMORSKIE option in location.province filter); for other types - value entered by user.

idSuffix.description: Suffix used as a second part of query parameter key to be used in request (the first part is filter id). Applicable for NUMERIC values only.

count.description: Number of search results matching this filter value.

selected.description: Indicates whether this filter value is used in current request.

id.description: Identifier of the filter. Should be used as query parameter key, optionally followed by idSuffix from parameter value (only for NUMERIC filters).

type.description: MULTI - multiple choice filter, SINGLE - single select (dropdown) filter, NUMERIC - range of numeric values (search offers with value matching this range), NUMERIC_SINGLE - single numeric value (search offers with given value matching the range defined in offer), TEXT - filter allowing user to input any text

minValue.description: Minimum valid value for filters of type NUMERIC.

maxValue.description: Maximum valid value for filters of type NUMERIC.

availableCount.description: Number of results available for navigation. If this number is less than the total count, search criteria (categories, filters) should be narrowed down to make all results available.

totalCount.description: Total number of search results for given parameters.

fallback.description: Indicates whether search fallback was used. If true, no items matching exact given phrase were found and related items are presented.

value.description: Query parameter value which should be used for this sorting option.

order.description: Order label specifying ascending or descending mode.

selected.description: Indicates whether this sorting options is used in current request.

boughtAt.description: ISO date when offer was bought

OrderEventStats.description: Event statistics, currently contains only basic information about the latest event.

LatestOrderEvent.description: Basic information about the latest order event.

CheckoutFormStatus.description: Describes status of the form delivery and purchase options based on payment and purchase status. * `BOUGHT` - purchase without checkout form filled in * `FILLED_IN` - checkout form filled in but payment is not completed yet so data could still change * `READY_FOR_PROCESSING` - payment completed. Purchase is ready for processing.

totalCount.description: Number of all objects of requested status(es) available (regardless of the provided limit and offset)

messageToSeller.example: Please send me an item in red color

name.description: Name of a company for which invoice should be issued

boughtAt.description: ISO date when offer was bought

totalToPay.description: Total to pay including additional services and delivery
